1984 Cocal Cola Light

TrueScale Miniatures TSM104315 Nissan Bluebird (910) 1984 Super Silhouette Series 3rd Place H. Yanagida



The Super Silhouette Series officially ended in 1983 but there were still 3 races in 1984 as the All Japan Sports Prototype Championship series got underway. Haruhito Yanagida drove the sole Bluebird for the 3 races. He finished 3rd in round 1 at Sugo, 3rd in round 2 at West, and 10th in the final round at Tsukuba. Itâ€™s not clear if there was a championship for the short 3 race season but, if there was, this was enough for him to secure 3rd overall for the season.
